title: Best Low Elo Champion?
body: Like it says in the Title, im just wanting to know the best/easiest champion to use in low Elo (Bronze - Gold)

replies.body: Annie, 0 mechanical skill (unless you wanna be fancy af), counters 90% of mids, works as 'supp' and destroys squishy escapeless adc's

Trolling? I have never lost to Annie mid. She is an absolute trash pick. Always has and always will be.

There is a reason she is refunded her Q: so she can have some semblance of wave clear - which is shyte at best.

Do not use Annie unless you want to go right down the shitter.

> [{quoted}](name=kaboomblah,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=UIZEoek9,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2018-04-14T08:56:48.721+0000)
>
> Trolling? I have never lost to Annie mid. She is an absolute trash pick. Always has and always will be.
> 
> There is a reason she is refunded her Q: so she can have some semblance of wave clear - which is shyte at best.
> 
> Do not use Annie unless you want to go right down the shitter.

Clearly you've never watched a pro explain the best champs for carrying in bronze, annie is always on their list
go search up LS on youtube :), If Annie is trash, explain the challenger player Annie Bot
Didn't you notice the low elo category? In what way does the op's post relate to how good you are against them in anyway?
I am just letting them know that Annie is not a strong pick. I say Warwick in another comment. I am contributing to the conversation relevantly.

You gotta give us some more context, because the easiest would be garan or lux were you have to go out of your way to die or the best would be fizz/zed because when I play fizz against new players I always feel guilty, guilt stops me from playing lux and fizz its a shame
Mate, you can't go any lower than Warwick.

Master Yi. Stomps low elo. See [here](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behaviour/nNzEaAlX-i-am-sick-and-tired-of-trolls) for a good reason. [Bronze 1 to Plat 5 in 400 games](http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=yiworldwide). If that guy can do it, anyone can, lol.
